subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: After working through the night, the lawyers, agents and accountants of Barcelona and Inter Milan were still striving Tuesday to thrash out a deal of a type rare even in transfer-crazed European soccer: a superstar swap.
snippet: After working through the night, the lawyers, agents and accountants of Barcelona and Inter Milan were still striving Tuesday to thrash out a deal of a type rare even in transfer-crazed European soccer: a superstar swap.
